category: Accounting regulations/Article 7 (Delegation and entrustment of accounting-related tasks)
contents: Article 7 (Delegation and entrustment of accounting-related work) ① When the Chairman of the Board deems it necessary to perform accounting work, he/she may delegate accounting-related work to affiliated employees. Revised August 26, 2021, ② Delegation of office work pursuant to the provisions of paragraph 1 may be replaced by designating a position established in the affiliated department. Revised August 26, 2021, ③ When deemed necessary for business operation, the Chairman may entrust accounting work to the trustee operator of the welfare facility.
